examples.text: I want to start the lesson

intents.description: If the user wants to begin their customized lesson.

examples.text: I want to begin the test

intents.description: User wants to begin the test based off of the customized lesson.
Displays an image of the phrase showing the breakdown of the adj, verbs, nouns etc.

examples.text: i am done with the lesson
I don't want to continue the lesson
can I get out of this lesson
I would like to stop the lesson

intents.description: Lets the user end the lesson

examples.text: can you give me the parts of speech
hey blue baguette give me the parts of speech
show me the parts of speech

intents.description: Prompt Watson for the parts of speech for each word in the phrase

examples.text: Let me try that quetion again
can I please see that question again
I would like to try that question again

intents.description: continue to next sentence of the lesson

examples.text: can you give me the audio recording of the phrase
what does the phrase sound like
can you play an audio recording of the phrase

intents.description: Prompts Watson for the audio recording of the phrase

examples.text: can you tell me the correct answer
can you show me the correct answer
I would like to see the answer

Hi this is Blue Baguette your personalized language instructor. I'm here to help you learn from your favorite shows! Let's get started, shall we? Tell me to start the lesson anytime!
